sentence.Network_en: The words were uttered in the hearing of Montezuma ( William Hickling Prescott ).

list.abs: ...蒙特苏侏儒螯虾（学名：Cambarellus montezumae）是一种常见的:Category:食用甲壳类|食用甲壳类，原生于墨西哥的侏儒螯虾属|侏儒螯虾，已能够人工养殖。蒙特苏侏儒螯虾是一种前哥伦布时期墨西哥人的传统食物，他们或煮或焗，再把肉包在玉米面豆卷里Cite book |author.

means.word_mean: 1. evergreen tree with large leathery leaves and large pink to orange flowers; considered a link plant between families Bombacaceae and Sterculiaceae

auth_sentence.content: Next up are Siddhartha, Hasdrubal, Montezuma, John of Gaunt, and finally my lifelong dream: Diocletian.
